item.description:
Dinner and a meeting postponed one week due to low attendance on the first.

We'll have our first "Chili Challenge" at Don and Sharon's home in Colchester. We'll need a two or three people to bring a pot of chili and others to bring corn bread, chips, guacomole, drinks, etc. RSVP with a food offering to round out the menu and plan to be there at 7:00. Business meeting immediately follows dinner.
item.why: In addition to a friendly dinner, you can help us plan the upcoming calendar of activities! What would you like to do with the tall club in the coming months?
item.name: "Chili Challenge" Dinner and a Meeting
